document.discussion_title: Melha Riders 10th Annual Hospital Run | WWLP.com
document.topic_text: Click to share on Pinterest (Opens in new window) CHICOPEE, Mass. (Mass Appeal) – The Melha Riders 10th Annual Hospital Run to benefit Shriners Hospital for Children in Springfield is coming soon! Dave Butterfield, Past Potentate and Melha Riders Club Member, Ed Geoffrion, Melha Riders Event Co-Chair, and Linda Jacobs, Committee Member for the event, told us more and showed off their motorcycles. Melha Riders 10th Annual Hospital Run Sunday, August 21st Sign up at 10AM, Ride at Noon Starts at Melha Shrine Center 133 Longhill Street, Springfield
